name: Classic Rectangle Frame
description: Classic rectangular frames with a timeless design that suits most face shapes.

ai_enhanced.feature_summary: These full-rim rectangular frames are crafted from high-quality acetate in sleek black. The balanced proportions provide comfort and style for everyday wear.
ai_enhanced.style_description: With a classic rectangular silhouette, these frames offer a sophisticated look suitable for both professional and casual settings. The timeless design flatters most face shapes, particularly round faces, by adding definition and structure. As expected from Ray-Ban, these frames deliver exceptional quality and craftsmanship that stands the test of time.

name: Modern Round Frame
description: Contemporary round frames with a lightweight feel and minimalist aesthetic.

ai_enhanced.feature_summary: These stylish round frames feature a sleek gold metal construction. The thin profile and minimalist design create a lightweight, comfortable fit.
ai_enhanced.style_description: These round frames offer a modern take on a retro-inspired style. The gold finish adds warmth to the face while the clean lines create a sophisticated look. Particularly flattering for square or angular face shapes, these frames soften features while making a subtle fashion statement. True to Warby Parker's mission, they deliver designer quality at an accessible price point.

name: Premium Cat-Eye Frame
description: Premium cat-eye frames with luxurious details and sophisticated styling.

ai_enhanced.feature_summary: These premium cat-eye frames are crafted from high-quality acetate in a rich tortoise pattern. The upswept design and luxurious details enhance their sophisticated appeal.
ai_enhanced.style_description: These cat-eye frames exude vintage glamour with a modern twist. The upswept silhouette enhances cheekbones and adds a feminine touch to any look. The tortoise pattern adds warmth and dimension, creating a luxurious aesthetic. With Gucci's signature approach to luxury, these frames blend bold design with premium materials and craftsmanship.
